scripts.docker_container_remove: docker container stop $npm_package_config_docker_container && docker container rm $npm_package_config_docker_container
scripts.docker_container_run_ansible: docker exec --user=`id -u` -e COLUMNS="`tput cols`" -e LINES="`tput lines`" -it $npm_package_config_docker_container bash -c 'sudo ansible-playbook /host/qtci/docker/ansible.yml'
scripts.use:qt5.9.2: docker exec --user=`id -u` -e COLUMNS="`tput cols`" -e LINES="`tput lines`" -it $npm_package_config_docker_container bash -c 'sudo ansible-playbook /host/qtci/docker/ansible-qt5.9.2.yml'
scripts.shell: docker exec --user=`id -u` -e COLUMNS="`tput cols`" -e LINES="`tput lines`" -it $npm_package_config_docker_container bash
